argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | pmatring.p | |- P = ( Poly1 ` R ) |
| 2 |  | pmatring.c | |- C = ( N Mat P ) |
| 3 |  | pmat0op.z | |- .0. = ( 0g ` P ) |
| 4 |  | pmat1op.o | |- .1. = ( 1r ` P ) |
| 5 |  | pmat1ovd.n | |- ( ph -> N e. Fin ) |
| 6 |  | pmat1ovd.r | |- ( ph -> R e. Ring ) |
| 7 |  | pmat1ovd.i | |- ( ph -> I e. N ) |
| 8 |  | pmat1ovd.j | |- ( ph -> J e. N ) |
| 9 |  | pmat1ovd.u | |- U = ( 1r ` C ) |
| 10 | 1 | #P_ply1ring | |- ( R e. Ring -> P e. Ring ) |
| 11 | 6, 10 | #P_syl | |- ( ph -> P e. Ring ) |
| 12 | 2, 4, 3, 5, 11, 7, 8, 9 | #P_mat1ov | |- ( ph -> ( I U J ) = if ( I = J , .1. , .0. ) ) |
